events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund because the size was not as expected and I want to return it as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to an issue with the product size, categorizing this case under Refund for further handling.
This case has been assigned to the refund processing team for prompt handling and resolution of the return request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit. I’ll assist you with the refund process right away.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging? This information will help us process the refund quickly.
Sure, the order number is 987654321, and the jacket is still unused with all the tags attached. It is in the original packaging as well.
Thank you for the details. You can send the jacket back to the provided return address. Once we receive it, we will process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response! I will send the jacket tomorrow and I appreciate the clear instructions on the refund process.
We have received your returned jacket and completed the refund. A confirmation email with the transaction details has been sent to you.
Just checking in to ensure that your refund was processed correctly and that you are satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
